name: Round up the largest of the three numbers
instruction:
Write a function `maxOfThree` that takes three numbers and returns the largest rounded number.

The name of the function parameters can be anything.

Examples of running the function:
```javascript.
maxOfThree(1.45, 2.12, 0.99) // 3
maxOfThree(1.45, 7.12, 2.99) // 8
maxOfThree(25, 24.2, 19.9) // 25
maxOfThree(0.1, 0.2, 0.3) // 1
```
